# Note: This is Glad version is for [OpenGL v3.3 Core] -> Generated by: https://glad.dav1d.de/

# Add your source file(s) to the project
add_library(glad STATIC ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/GLAD/src/glad.c)

# Include local library
target_include_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PUBLIC ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/GLAD)

# Link the directory containing this library's path
target_link_directories(${PROJECT_NAME} PRIVATE
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/lib/GLAD
)
